TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because of the Alaskan Bull Worm!

Because he is just exploring it, he hasn't found everything yet.

Because Firefox.

oh i dont know. wear dread locks grow a beard and be a creator of a game.

becoz hes an oven.

Nah mate. You need to go back the way you came, then a right at the lights, straight at the roundabout, third exit at the next roundabout then turn off after the petrol station.
